issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
There's some strange code in the output handler that changes output directory into a file because Hive supposedly wants that. 
If you run insert overwrite with a side directory multiple times, the 2nd insert fails
fields.summary: HBase HFile write does strange things
